org.mozilla.javascript

Class IRFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mozilla.javascript.Parser
      • org.mozilla.javascript.IRFactory

  • public final class IRFactory
extends Parser
    This class rewrites the parse tree into an IR suitable for codegen.
